      User Section  ¶

      getAllUsers
      GET/users

      Returns a list of users

      Example URI

      GET https://myapi.org/users
      Response  200
      HideShow
      Headers
      Content-Type: application/json
      Body
      [
  {
    "uid": 1,
    "username": "username",
    "email": "test@mail.de"
  }
]
